name: Killby
description:
A mature rated version of your favourite pink monster.

CONTROLS

Move = keyboard arrows-AWSD, playstation joystick
Transform = keyboard E, playstation circle
Jump/Shoot/Horn = keyboard space, playstation square
Inflate/Deflate = during a jump, keyboard space, playstation square
Change camera = keyboard C, playstation triangle
Rotate camera mode = keyboard  R + arrows, playstation R1 + joystick

DONATE - Help me to get a good lawyer and make better games

- Ko-fi
- Buymeacoffee

AUTHOR

Miquel Camps
- Twitter

I'M LOOKING FOR A JOB - In the videogame industry

It looks like the Californication game is not enough to impress any videogame company, so except the music and 3d models I made the level design, game design, programming and the video too, I'm a good person I promise!

I would like to work as a game developer and I made this game to show what I can do with Unity, check my profile to play my other games.
